column1:
A
s per the proceedings, it is evident that the Petitioner’s daughter has failed to return to  Sri
Lanka as for the undertaking or appear in court on notice. The Petitioner was fully aware of

the  obligation 
to  present  her  daughter  before 
the  court 
in  connection  with 
the 
legal

proceedings.  However,  despite 
this  knowledge, 
the  Petitioner 
failed 
to 
secure  of  her
daughter’s presence in the country, or to take any steps to ensure her appearance as required
